title: leaverbuster queue refreshing
body: why the hell does this happen. as soon as i have 12 or 11 minutes left on my queue timer it resets to 20 minutes. I know it's not my bloody internet because it's a consistent 16 ping. Here's a screenshot of it glitching. https://imgur.com/gallery/ZCdhu i'm honestly so annoyed, I've found so many other posts about this on other boards and riot just doesn't respond.

replies.body: create support ticket I reckon. seems odd.
